Great accommodation provides four double bedrooms, bathrooms include an ensuite and ducted heating, evaporative cooling, an alarm, tandem carport and wide garage with large water tank also feature. Moments to Buckley Park sporting facilities, schools, trams and Keilor Road shops it could hardly be better placed.
